title: Copenhagen shooting: Shopping mall gunman charged with murder
content:
1. Copenhagen shooting: Shopping mall gunman charged with murder  BBC
  2. Denmark mall shooting: Suspect acted alone and incident was not terror-related, Copenhagen police say  Fox News
